dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:x.year_key:year_key@, @SELECT:x.year_name:year_name@, @SELECT:x.record_type @+@ '-' @+@ x.year_name:sort_order@ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT 'A' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND ppm_dwh.dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'B' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key NOT IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND ppm_dwh.dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date)) x WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:x.year_key:year_key@, @SELECT:x.year_name:year_name@, @SELECT:x.record_type @+@ '-' @+@ x.year_name:sort_order@ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT 'A' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'B' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key NOT IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date)) x WHERE @FILTER@

SELECT @SELECT:x.year_key:year_key@, @SELECT:x.year_name:year_name@, @SELECT:x.record_type @+@ '-' @+@ x.year_name:sort_order@ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT 'A' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'B' record_type, c.year_key year_key, cln.year_name year_name FROM dwh_cmn_period c INNER JOIN dwh_cmn_period_ln cln ON c.period_key = cln.period_key AND cln.language_code = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ WHERE 1=1 AND c.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND c.year_key NOT IN (SELECT a.year_key FROM dwh_cmn_period a WHERE a.period_type_key = 'FISCAL' AND dwh_cal_trunc_date_fct(@SYSDATE@) BETWEEN a.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date)) x WHERE @FILTER@
